name: Ch14BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Larachel;Might I have a moment of your time?
speak;Larachel;Allow me to introduce myself!|I am the beautiful princess of peerless beauty, L'Arachel!
speak;Colm;Yeah, I know who you are.|What do you want from me?
speak;Larachel;Well, you see...|I've been searching for a man named Rennac.|Have you perhaps encountered him in your travels?
speak;Larachel;Oh, how troubling!|He disappeared from my sight a few weeks ago.|Simply vanished without a trace!
speak;Colm;What does this guy do anyway?|Why are you looking for him?
speak;Larachel;Rennac possesses a most useful talent!|He excels at lockpicking and liberating valuable items from the clutches of evil men!
speak;Larachel;A most valuable skill in our sacred mission to vanquish darkness!
speak;Colm;Wait a minute...|That sounds exactly like what I do.
speak;Colm;I'm pretty good with locks and..."liberating" things myself.
speak;Larachel;Truly?!|The light of fortune shines upon us!|Could it be that the Everlasting has guided me to you in Rennac's absence?
speak;Larachel;Tell me, could you perhaps use this special staff?|Rennac would wield it from time to time on our righteous quests!
speak;Larachel;I never quite understood its purpose, but he seemed most insistent on carrying it!
speak;Colm;Is that...|Hold on, that's an Unlock Staff!
speak;Colm;I mean...|some kind of special staff. Yes.
speak;Colm;I could definitely try my hand at using it.|These things are...very specialized.
speak;Larachel;Wonderful!|You truly are a blessing!|Would you also be willing to help me locate Rennac?
speak;Colm;Sure, I can keep an eye out for him.|I'll let you know if I track him down.
speak;Colm;In the meantime, I'll take good care of this staff.|Very good care indeed.
speak;Larachel;Oh, thank you!|Your assistance brings joy to my noble heart!|The sacred mission continues unhindered!
speak;Larachel;I shall leave you to your task then!|May the light of justice guide your path!
speak;Colm;Heh.|This is perfect.|An Unlock Staff...|Think of all the chests I can open without picking a single lock!
speak;Colm;Sorry Rennac, but I'm not in any hurry to find you now.|Finders keepers!
